@context.description: Defines semantic context of the Verifiable Credential

id.description: Defines unique identifier of the Verifiable Credential

issuer.description: Defines the issuer of the Verifiable Credential

issuanceDate.description: Defines the date and time, when the Verifiable Credential becomes valid

validFrom.description: Defines the date and time, when the Verifiable Credential becomes valid

issued.description: Defines when the Verifiable Credential was issued

expirationDate.description: Defines the date and time, when the Verifiable Credential expires

credentialSubject.description: Defines information about the subject that is described by the Verifiable Credential

certificationClaims.description: Defines a list of claims that define/determine the DCC VCs. Mandatory

refDCC.description: Includes the external reference to the DCC

Class.description: Defines the output class of DCC

standard.description: Defines the reference standards used for the issuance of the DCC

equipments.description: Defines the list of equipment used

items.description: Define the id of the equipment instrument and the reference to its DCC in the off-chain storage

refDCC.description: the external reference of the DCC

limitJurisdiction.description: Defines the jurisdiction for which the certification is valid

reviewDate.description: Defines the The date when the certification has to be re-viewed

credentialSchema.description: Contains information about the credential schema (template) on which the Verifiable Credential is based

id.description: References the credential schema (template) stored on the (relevant) Schemas Registry (SR) on which the Verifiable Credential is based

evidence.description: Contains information about the process which resulted in the issuance of the Verifiable Credential

id.description: If present, it MUST contain a URL that points to where more information about this instance of evidence can be found.

verifier.description: Defines entity which has verified documents before Verifiable Credential issuance

evidenceDocument.description: Defines document(s) which have been verified before Verifiable Credential issuance

subjectPresence.description: Defines if the Verifiable Credential subject was physically present in the course of the verification

documentPresence.description: Defines how the document(s) which have been verified before Verifiable Credential issuance have been provided (e.g. physically, digitally)

proofPurpose.description: Defines the purpose of the proof

created.description: Defines the date and time, when the proof has been created

verificationMethod.description: Contains information about the verification method / proof mechanisms

jws.description: Defines the proof value in JWS format
